ref.div: Harvey D, Gregory J, Hoffert M, Jain AK, Lal M, Leemans R, et al. An Introduction to Simple Climate Models used in the IPCC Second Assessment Report. In: Houghton JT, Meira Filho LG, Griggs DJ, Maskell K, editors. Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change Second Assessment Report: IPCC Working Group I; 1997.
